ErrorBoundary.Text:
An error has occurred. We apologise for any inconvenience this has caused!
Press the button below to restart the app.
Hopefully we have already known that it happened and trying to fix it it.

NoConnection.Text: Check the internet connection and restart the app

ServerError.Text:
The server is temporarily unavailable
Please try to restart the app later

Modal.Text: A new update for the app is available! Do you want to update the app?

Mandatory.Title: Update the app
Mandatory.Text: To continue working with the app, you need to install a new version

Maintenance.Title: We are sorry, the system is currently under maintenance
Maintenance.Text_WithoutDate:
The app is temporarily unavailable
Please try to launch it later
Maintenance.Text_WithDate:
The app is temporarily unavailable
It will become available in

Login.Text: To use private access screens you need to log in, check hint button for fake credentials
Login.Hint: You can type credentials username="user" password="user123"

Template.Text:
It is custom boilerplate RN template.
Everything already is here. You don't need wasting time for configuring, redux, env variables, tests, bootsplash etc.

Just remove some dummy screens and non going for use code and start new awesome project

Auth.Text:
It does NOT use any authorization (with server) - it only simulates - store fake auth-token in async-storage.

You can navigate to profile and if you are not authorized yet - you can type hardcoded credentials.
P.S. it is done juts to demonstrate how navigator works and how you can handle authorization flow.

Dev.Text:
This template (app) has hidden screens which is available by tapping 7-10 click on LOGO in "App info" screen. I- symbol in top right corner.

 It is usuful to test or simulate some things which shouldn't be available for end-user.

Libs.UI_Text:
- React navigation
- React-native-modals
- React-native-bootsplash
- SafeAreaContext
- KeyboardAware
Libs.Utils_Text:
- i18next
- Date-fns
- React-native-config (ENV)
- React-native-startup-time
- React-native-make  (helper for app icons)
- Why-did-you-render

Profile.Disclaimer: it is dummy block text render here whatever you want
Profile.Other: You can add extra info and even icons for such fields

Shake.Text: We've notices that you have shaken a device, are you going to report some bug-report info?
